resources.string: Breifly vibrate the phone when a sajdah detected by the app.
Dim the screen brightness, only temporarily increase screen brightness when a sajdah is detected.
Hides the titlebar, reduces distractions. Changing this setting will work next time you start the application.
Sajdah counter helps you keep track of sajood during the prayer. This app is for people with attention problems, who have difficulty remembering the rakat.
